creator: rene_zheng@hotmail.com
text:
I have a .sh file which need to be run first before run an executable .exe file.
How can i have ONE task to run TWO executable,.sh first and then .exe.

creator: alexeys@inventigo.com
text:
It is better to use user mailing list for that. .sh and .exe extensions hint on Cygwin.  Run something like that:

bash -c batch.sh;program.exe

or with cmd.exe:

cmd /c batch.bat&program.exe
